creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the artist with the assistance of Keiko Gallery
description: large circular stone form split into two parts down the middle with attaching 2-pronged brass fork with angel wing at top; prong connects to center of stone
signed:
Signature

on brass plate at center of circular form, cast in brass,: [TOSHI]
title: Passion for Persistance
